name: Shop Reset !
description:
This game was made in approx 12 hours for BYOG 2021 Game Jam based on the THEME : RESET

This is my first game jam game ever and also the first one on itch.

Shop Reset is a game where you play as a shop manager customers go around your shop and buy items , if customers find the products they are looking for it improves your reputation but if not your reputation will be negatively  affected. Items bought by customers are re spawned on the floor , place each spawned item in its correct shelf before the customers buy the item they need. 

Beware of thieves , they usually throw items on the floor , pick those items and put them in the correct shelf..

Hope all of you enjoy playing this game....

WEBGL VERSION (UPLOADED AFTER GAME JAM BECAUSE OF UPLOADING ISSUES AND BUILD TAKING LONGER): https://abdullah-noor557.itch.io/shop-reset-webgl
